title: I am an engineer
brief_description: Intended to stimulate interest in power electrical engineering, this film presents a series of electro-magnetic phenomena on a “why is it so” basis. Professor Eric Laithwaite (electrical engineer) of the Imperial College, London discusses several aspects of work being done, particularly in the field of electro-magnetically propelled vehicles.
